alert.note: Alert for Shelby (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 25 at 6:13AM CST until February 26 at 7:42AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Tennessee... Wolf River at Germantown For the Wolf River...including Rossville, Germantown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wolf River at Germantown. * WHEN...Until tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Greenway flooding along the Wolf River is extensive from Houston Levee Road to Interstate 40. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 21.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 5:45 AM CST Friday was 21.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to crest at 21.3 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage just after midnight tonight. - Flood stage is 20.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
